author: dgraham
msg: Throw exceptions from execute() method instead of sending a failure
response to the client.  This allows the exception handling mechanism to
respond to the error gracefully.  PR# 16774.

msg: Added lang attribute and deprecated locale attribute for PR# 18000.

msg: Reorganise the prerequisite properties documentation into required and
